summary: The Coast Guard is modernizing its fleets of aircraft, cutters, and other assets, but it continues to lack a long-term plan to guide these efforts. Instead, it relies on a short-term focus of yearly budgets and its 5-year plan. This has led to unpredictable funding and capability gaps. title: Coast Guard: Improved Acquisition Portfolio Management Could Help Address Aging Assets and Capability Gaps
